description: misc/dist: update darwin to be more like linux

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Surely this does not work anymore.
../bin/tool/dist is no more.
Use go tool dist.

Russ

On 14 February 2012 15:21, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> Surely this does not work anymore.
> ../bin/tool/dist is no more.
> Use go tool dist.

You're right. It was an old change that I hadn't mailed.

I think I'm going to redo these dist.bash scripts as a go program (not
named dist ;-).

subject: code review 5660050: misc/dist: update darwin to be more like linux
